artist: Tanaka Yoshikado; Published by Naitō Den'emon
creditline: Gift of Captain G. B. Powell, Jr., JAGC, USA
description: soft-bound book with yellow paper covers; printed white label on front cover; brush and ink inscription on back cover; text and images including Noah's ark, desert, mountain and ocean scenes, and portraits in tondos
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
title: Short History of the World, Tanaka Yoshikado Edition, vol. 1
